get.description: The authentication token endpoint allows developers to retrieve a public auth token required to do further activities with the Brick system. The access token will be live for five minutes and can be use for one time only.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username for clients(You can collect this from Brick dashboard)

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for client(You can collect this from Brick dashboard)

message.example: Access token is valid for 5 minutes and can use one time only
Please use the APIs with Username in headers

action.example: Please get correct username from Brick dashboard or connect with Brick sales team

message.example: Please use live Public_access_token in headers

action.example: Please generate valid public access token via /v2/payments/auth/token APIs or contact to Brick sales team

message.example: Please use live Public_access_token in headers

action.example: Please generate valid public access token via /v2/payments/auth/token APIs or contact to Brick sales team
